metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7032 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: webcheckout in myrepos through 1.20171231 does not sanitize URLs that are passed to git clone, allowing a malicious website operator or a MitM attacker to take advantage of it for arbitrary code execution, as demonstrated by an "ext::sh -c" attack or an option injection attack.

criterions.comment: mr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
myrepos: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
